TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ISoapServerTlb

summary.span: 處理伺服器上已驗證、加密的 SOAP 元件。

span.span: Processes authenticated, encrypted SOAP components on servers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請參閱預設實作。See for the default implementation. 為.NET framework 內部使用。 is used internally by the .NET Framework. 您不需要在您的程式碼中直接使用它。You do not need to use it directly in your code.

summary.span: 根據安全性選項將伺服器型別程式庫的項目加入 Web.config 和 Default.disco 檔案；若有必要則產生 Proxy。

span.span: Adds the entries for a server type library to the Web.config and Default.disco files, depending on security options, and generates a proxy if necessary.

exception.span: 呼叫鏈結中的呼叫端沒有存取 Unmanaged 程式碼的使用權限。

span.span: A caller in the call chain does not have permission to access unmanaged code.

exception.span: SOAP 公用程式無法使用。

span.span: The SOAP utility is not available.

exception.span: 要取得系統目錄的呼叫失敗。

span.span: The call to get the system directory failed.

summary.span: 根據安全性選項從 Web.config 和 Default.disco 檔案移除伺服器型別程式庫的項目。

span.span: Removes entries for a server type library from the Web.config and Default.disco files, depending on security options.
